description: Identifier for the fuel import layout/template this mapping row belongs to; groups a set of field positions and lengths for a specific vendor or file format.
Logical name of the data element in the fuel file (e.g., ACCOUNT, DRIVER, QUANTITY), used to map fixed-width positions to business fields.
Starting character offset of the field within a fixed-width fuel record (likely 0-based); used by the parser to locate data; confirm indexing with SME.
Number of characters the field occupies in the fixed-width record; defines substring length during parsing and validation.
Decimal places to apply when interpreting numeric fields (e.g., cost, quantity); 0 means integers; confirm whether implied decimals are used.
User ID or process that created the mapping definition.
Timestamp when the mapping definition was created (timezone per system; confirm UTC vs local).
User ID that last modified the mapping definition.
Timestamp of the most recent update to the mapping definition (timezone per system; confirm UTC vs local).
